title: 如果设置MV多世界单个动物/怪物的生成
author: liangruikangfkj
txt_content: 某狼原帖说过可以生成一个全是苦力怕的世界，然后去Github试了一遍貌似弄不成，谁给个方法？

replies.author: twt141666
replies.txt_content:
如果命令失效
可以编辑

monsters:    spawn: false    exceptions:    - creeper
只有苦力怕的世界.

replies.author: twt141666
replies.txt_content: 详见Multiverse-core WikiA note about animals and monsters:The animals and monsters values when used with set will set the overall spawn behavior of animals/monsters. If you have any monsters in the monsters list and you /mv modify set monsters true you're saying: "I want monsters to spawn, except the ones in the monsters list"首先/mv modify set monsters true 然后/mv modify remove zombie monsters即 删除了僵尸在当前世界的生成.
